law.catch_line: The oath prescribed by Article I, § 9 of the Maryland Constitution shall be taken and subscribed be...

text.section: On or as soon as practicable after the third Monday of January next after the election for Comptroller, the successful candidate for that office shall qualify by taking the oath prescribed by Article I, § 9 of the Maryland Constitution.
The Secretary of State shall maintain a book that records the oaths taken and subscribed under this section.
